scripts.build:firefox: copy-file configs/firefox/index.html webapp/index.html && npm run build
scripts.build:chrome: copy-file configs/chrome/index.html webapp/index.html && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run package:firefox && npm run package:chrome
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && npm run clean:firefox && copy-file configs/firefox/manifest.json package/firefox/manifest.json && copy-file LICENSE package/firefox/LICENSE && copy-file README.md package/firefox/README.md && copy-folder webapp/dist package/firefox && copy-folder icons/ package/firefox/icons
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && npm run clean:chrome && copy-file configs/chrome/manifest.json package/chrome/manifest.json && copy-file LICENSE package/chrome/LICENSE && copy-file README.md package/chrome/README.md && copy-folder webapp/dist package/chrome && copy-folder icons package/chrome/icons
scripts.release: npm run release:firefox && npm run release:chrome
scripts.release:firefox: npm run package:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir package/firefox --artifacts-dir releases --filename {name}-{version}-firefox.xpi --overwrite-dest
scripts.release:chrome: npm run package:chrome && web-ext build --source-dir package/chrome --artifacts-dir releases --filename {name}-{version}-chrome.zip --overwrite-dest
